title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4021.2 - Overnight events limited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4021.2 - Overnight events limited

State Regulations

After May 31st in each year, only four overnight events
for a distance less than a mile for horses three years old and upwards shall be
given on any race day, except upon approval by the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4021.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
